summary: Comedy about teachers and students at a high school in a small provincial town. Mihailo tries to win the heart of a girl his brother is also chasing.
cast: Dragan Micanovic|Natasa Tapuskovic|Nikola Simic|Velimir 'Bata' Zivojinovic|Aleksandar Bercek|Bogdan Diklic|Dragan Jovanovic|Nikola Djuricko|Isidora Minic|Branimir Brstina|Vesna Trivalic|Maja Sabljic|Dragomir Cumic|Albena Stavreva|Nenad Jezdic|Nebojsa Ilic|Igor Pervic|Petar Cirica|Nebojsa Milovanovic|Mihajlo 'Bata' Paskaljevic|Tihomir Stanic|Milorad Damjanovic|Rastko Jankovic|Ksenija Zelenovic|Marko Jeremic|Sandra Balaban|Marko Cvorovic|Katarina Mitrovic|Jovica Jasin|Dusan Corovic|Dijana Marojevic|Dusan Milosevic|Selimir Tosic|Milivoje 'Mica' Tomic|Dragomir Stanojevic
title: Lajanje na zvezde
